pli-tv-bu-pm:1.1: Sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca;
pli-tv-bu-pm:2.1: Chanda, pārisuddhi, utukkhānaṃ, bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo;
pli-tv-bu-pm:3.3: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti, “pattakalla”nti vuccati.
pli-tv-bu-pm:4.1: Pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni samāpetvā desitāpattikassa samaggassa bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ karoma.
pli-tv-bu-pm:5.3: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya.
pli-tv-bu-pm:6.4: taṃ sabbeva santā sādhukaṃ suṇoma manasi karoma.
pli-tv-bu-pm:6.8: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti, evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:6.9: Yo pana bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ anusāviyamāne saramāno santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikareyya, sampajānamusāvādassa hoti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:6.10: Sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyasmanto antarāyiko dhammo vutto bhagavatā,
pli-tv-bu-pm:6.11: tasmā saramānena bhikkhunā āpannena visuddhāpekkhena santī āpatti āvikātabbā,
pli-tv-bu-pm:8.1: Tatrime cattāro pārājikā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:9.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:10.1: Yo pana bhikkhu gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:10.2: yathārūpe adinnādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā pabbājeyyuṃ vā corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosīti, tathārūpaṃ bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyamāno
pli-tv-bu-pm:11.1: Yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyya, maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:11.2: “ambho purisa kiṃ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena, mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:11.3: iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:11.6: Yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ attupanāyikaṃ alamariyañāṇadassanaṃ samudācareyya “iti jānāmi, iti passāmī”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:11.7: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṃ vadeyya “ajānamevaṃ āvuso avacaṃ jānāmi, apassaṃ passāmi, tucchaṃ musā vilapi”nti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:13.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:13.2: Yesaṃ bhikkhu aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ
pli-tv-bu-pm:13.3: yathā pure, tathā pacchā, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:14.1: Ime kho panāyasmanto terasa saṅghādisesā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:16.1: Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyya hatthaggāhaṃ vā veṇiggāhaṃ vā aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ, saṅghādiseso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:17.1: Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāseyya yathā taṃ yuvā yuvatiṃ methunupasaṃhitāhi, saṅghādiseso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:18.1: Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya “etadaggaṃ bhagini pāricariyānaṃ yā mādisaṃ sīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dhammena paricareyyā”ti methunupasaṃhitena, saṅghādiseso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:19.1: Yo pana bhikkhu sañcarittaṃ samāpajjeyya itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ purisassa vā itthimatiṃ, jāyattane vā jārattane vā, antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapi, saṅghādiseso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:20.1: Saññācikāya pana bhikkhunā kuṭiṃ kārayamānena assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso dvādasa vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ sattantarā,
pli-tv-bu-pm:20.2: bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāya, tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:20.3: Sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kāreyya, bhikkhū vā anabhineyya vatthudesanāya, pamāṇaṃ vā atikkāmeyya, saṅghādiseso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:21.1: Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:21.2: tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:21.3: Sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kāreyya, bhikkhū vā anabhineyya vatthudesanāya, saṅghādiseso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:22.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ duṭṭho doso appatīto amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:22.2: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti, bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, saṅghādiseso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:23.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ duṭṭho doso appatīto aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:23.2: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā aññabhāgiyañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti kocideso lesamatto upādinno, bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, saṅghādiseso.
pli-tv-bu-pm:24.1: Yo pana bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkameyya, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo
pli-tv-bu-pm:24.2: “māyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi,
pli-tv-bu-pm:24.3: sametāyasmā saṅghena, samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:24.4: evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:24.5: yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:25.1: Tasseva kho pana bhikkhussa bhikkhū honti anuvattakā vaggavādakā eko vā dve vā tayo vā, te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ
pli-tv-bu-pm:25.3: dhammavādī ceso bhikkhu, vinayavādī ceso bhikkhu,
pli-tv-bu-pm:25.4: amhākañceso bhikkhu chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati, jānāti, no bhāsati, amhākampetaṃ khamatī”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:25.7: na ceso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavādī,
pli-tv-bu-pm:25.9: sametāyasmantānaṃ saṅghena, samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:25.10: evañca te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ, te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:25.11: yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:26.1: Bhikkhu paneva dubbacajātiko hoti uddesapariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti
pli-tv-bu-pm:26.2: “mā maṃ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
pli-tv-bu-pm:26.5: “māyasmā attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi, vacanīyamevāyasmā attānaṃ karotu,
pli-tv-bu-pm:26.6: āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadatu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṃ vakkhanti sahadhammena,
pli-tv-bu-pm:26.7: evaṃ saṃvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṃ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:26.8: evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:26.9: yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:27.1: Bhikkhu paneva aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati kuladūsako pāpasamācāro, tassa kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulāni ca tena duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
pli-tv-bu-pm:27.3: “āyasmā kho kuladūsako pāpasamācāro, āyasmato kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulāni cāyasmatā duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, pakkamatāyasmā imamhā āvāsā, alaṃ te idha vāsenā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:27.4: evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno te bhikkhū evaṃ vadeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:27.5: “chandagāmino ca bhikkhū, dosagāmino ca bhikkhū, mohagāmino ca bhikkhū, bhayagāmino ca bhikkhū tādisikāya āpattiyā ekaccaṃ pabbājenti, ekaccaṃ na pabbājentī”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:27.7: “māyasmā evaṃ avaca, na ca bhikkhū chandagāmino, na ca bhikkhū dosagāmino, na ca bhikkhū mohagāmino, na ca bhikkhū bhayagāmino,
pli-tv-bu-pm:27.8: āyasmā kho kuladūsako pāpasamācāro, āyasmato kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulāni cāyasmatā duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, pakkamatāyasmā imamhā āvāsā, alaṃ te idha vāsenā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:27.9: evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:27.10: yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:28.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto terasa saṅghādisesā dhammā nava paṭhamāpattikā, cattāro yāvatatiyakā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:28.2: Yesaṃ bhikkhu aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjitvā yāvatīhaṃ jānaṃ paṭicchādeti, tāvatīhaṃ tena bhikkhunā akāmā parivatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:28.3: Parivutthaparivāsena bhikkhunā uttari chārattaṃ bhikkhumānattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:28.4: ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho, tattha so bhikkhu abbhetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-pm:28.5: Ekenapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya, so ca bhikkhu anabbhito, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
pli-tv-bu-pm:29.1: Ime kho panāyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:30.1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye nisajjaṃ kappeyya, tamenaṃ saddheyyavacasā upāsikā disvā
pli-tv-bu-pm:30.2: tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena vadeyya pārājikena vā saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā,
pli-tv-bu-pm:30.3: nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo pārājikena vā saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā,
pli-tv-bu-pm:30.4: yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya, tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo,
pli-tv-bu-pm:31.1: Na heva kho pana paṭicchannaṃ āsanaṃ hoti nālaṃkammaniyaṃ, alañca kho hoti mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsituṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:31.2: yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpe āsane mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, tamenaṃ saddheyyavacasā upāsikā disvā
pli-tv-bu-pm:31.3: dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena vadeyya saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā,
pli-tv-bu-pm:31.4: nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā,
pli-tv-bu-pm:31.5: yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya, tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo,
pli-tv-bu-pm:32.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:33.1: Ime kho panāyasmanto tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:34.1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:35.1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:36.1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya, ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:36.3: no cassa pāripūri, māsaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ ūnassa pāripūriyā satiyā paccāsāya.
pli-tv-bu-pm:36.4: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyāpi paccāsāya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:37.1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpeyya vā rajāpeyya vā ākoṭāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:38.1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya aññatra pārivattakā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:39.1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpeyya aññatra samayā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:39.2: Tatthāyaṃ samayo, acchinnacīvaro vā hoti bhikkhu, naṭṭhacīvaro vā, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
pli-tv-bu-pm:40.1: Tañce aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā bahūhi cīvarehi abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya, santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:40.2: Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:41.1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa aññātakassa gahapatissa vā gahapatāniyā vā cīvaracetāpannaṃ upakkhaṭaṃ hoti
pli-tv-bu-pm:41.2: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādessāmī”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:41.3: tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:41.4: “sādhu vata maṃ āyasmā iminā cīvaracetāpannena evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādehī”ti
pli-tv-bu-pm:42.1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa ubhinnaṃ aññātakānaṃ gahapatīnaṃ vā gahapatānīnaṃ vā paccekacīvaracetāpannāni upakkhaṭāni honti
pli-tv-bu-pm:42.2: “imehi mayaṃ paccekacīvaracetāpannehi paccekacīvarāni cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarehi acchādessāmā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:42.3: tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:42.4: “sādhu vata maṃ āyasmanto imehi paccekacīvaracetāpannehi evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādetha ubhova santā ekenā”ti
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa rājā vā rājabhoggo vā brāhmaṇo vā gahapatiko vā dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.2: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.3: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.4: “idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.5: Tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.6: “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya”nti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.7: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.9: Cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.11: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.12: “yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi, saññatto so mayā, upasaṅkamatāyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.13: Cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.15: dvattikkhattuṃ codayamāno sārayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.16: no ce abhinipphādeyya, catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.17: catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūto uddissa tiṭṭhamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.18: tato ce uttari vāyamamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.19: No ce abhinipphādeyya, yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, tattha sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ, dūto vā pāhetabbo
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.20: “yaṃ kho tumhe āyasmanto bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha, na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:43.21: yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:44.1: Yo pana bhikkhu kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:45.1: Yo pana bhikkhu suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:46.1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārayamānena dve bhāgā suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ ādātabbā, tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:46.2: Anādā ce bhikkhu dve bhāge suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ, tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ, navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:47.1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārāpetvā chabbassāni dhāretabbaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-pm:47.2: orena ce channaṃ vassānaṃ taṃ santhataṃ vissajjetvā vā avissajjetvā vā aññaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:48.1: Nisīdanasanthataṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthi ādātabbā dubbaṇṇakaraṇāya.
pli-tv-bu-pm:48.2: Anādā ce bhikkhu purāṇasantha tassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ, navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:49.2: ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbāni, paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbāni asante hārake.
pli-tv-bu-pm:49.3: Tato ce uttari hareyya, asantepi hārake, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:50.1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpeyya vā rajāpeyya vā vijaṭāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:51.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jātarūparajataṃ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:52.1: Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:53.1: Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:54.1: Dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto dhāretabbo, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:55.1: Yo pana bhikkhu ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:55.2: Tena bhikkhunā so patto bhikkhuparisāya nissajjitabbo,
pli-tv-bu-pm:55.3: yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo “ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:56.1: Yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṃ—sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ, tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbāni,
pli-tv-bu-pm:57.1: “Māso seso gimhāna”nti bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ, “addhamāso seso gimhāna”nti katvā nivāsetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:57.2: Orena ce “māso seso gimhāna”nti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya, orena“ddhamāso seso gimhāna”nti katvā nivāseyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:58.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:59.1: Yo pana bhikkhu sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:60.1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya, tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:60.2: “idaṃ kho, āvuso, cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati, āyatañca karotha, vitthatañca, appitañca, suvītañca, suppavāyitañca, suvilekhitañca, suvitacchitañca karotha,
pli-tv-bu-pm:60.3: appeva nāma mayampi āyasmantānaṃ kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:60.4: Evañca so bhikkhu vatvā kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampi, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:61.1: Dasāhānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamaṃ bhikkhuno paneva accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya, accekaṃ maññamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paṭiggahetvā yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:61.2: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:62.1: Upavassaṃ kho pana kattikapuṇṇamaṃ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni, tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipeyya, siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:62.2: chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:63.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:64.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:65.1: Ime kho panāyasmanto dvenavuti pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:66.1: Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:67.1: Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:68.1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:69.1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseyya aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:70.1: Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya, bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:71.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa āroceyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:72.1: Yo pana bhikkhu pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:73.1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya, anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:74.1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya, anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:75.1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya “yassa sambādho bhavissati, so pakkamissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:76.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ kupito anattamano saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:77.1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:78.1: Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:79.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:80.1: Yo pana bhikkhu asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:81.1: Sammatopi ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:82.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:82.2: Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānā hoti bhikkhunī, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
pli-tv-bu-pm:83.1: Yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya “āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:84.1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dadeyya aññatra pārivattakā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:85.1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:86.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:86.2: Tatthāyaṃ samayo, satthagamanīyo hoti maggo, sāsaṅkasammato, sappaṭibhayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
pli-tv-bu-pm:87.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruheyya uddhaṃgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:88.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:89.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:91.2: Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo, mahāsamayo, samaṇabhattasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
pli-tv-bu-pm:92.2: Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
pli-tv-bu-pm:93.1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva kulaṃ upagataṃ pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya, ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā dvattipattapūrā paṭiggahetabbā. Tato ce uttari paṭiggaṇheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:93.2: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvā tato nīharitvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
pli-tv-bu-pm:94.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhuttāvī pavārito anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:95.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya “handa bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho, bhuttasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:96.1: Yo pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:97.1: Yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:98.1: Yāni kho pana tāni paṇītabhojanāni, seyyathidaṃ—sappi, navanītaṃ, telaṃ, madhu, phāṇitaṃ, maccho, maṃsaṃ, khīraṃ, dadhi. Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:99.1: Yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:100.1: Yo pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:101.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ “ehāvuso, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti tassa dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojeyya “gacchāvuso, na me tayā saddhiṃ kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hoti, ekakassa me kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hotī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:102.1: Yo pana bhikkhu sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:103.1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:104.1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:105.1: Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:105.2: Tatthāyaṃ samayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
pli-tv-bu-pm:106.1: Agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya, aññatra niccapavāraṇāya. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:107.1: Yo pana bhikkhu uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:108.1: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya, dirattatirattaṃ tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:109.1: Dirattatirattaṃ ce bhikkhu senāya vasamāno uyyodhikaṃ vā balaggaṃ vā senābyūhaṃ vā anīkadassanaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:109.13: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:110.1: Yo pana bhikkhu agilāno visibbanāpekkho jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:111.1: Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:111.2: Tatthāyaṃ samayo “diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhāna”nti “vassānassa paṭhamo māso” iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, vātavuṭṭhisamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
pli-tv-bu-pm:112.1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ ādātabbaṃ nīlaṃ vā kaddamaṃ vā kāḷasāmaṃ vā. Anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:113.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:114.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā antamaso hasāpekkhopi, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:115.1: Yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:116.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:117.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:118.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:119.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādeyya, so ca puggalo anupasampanno, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, idaṃ tasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:120.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:121.1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:122.2: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:122.4: “māyasmā evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:122.5: anekapariyāyenāvuso antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:122.6: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-pm:122.7: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:123.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā, saṃvaseyya vā, saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:124.2: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:124.4: “māvuso, samaṇuddesa evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya,
pli-tv-bu-pm:124.5: anekapariyāyenāvuso, samaṇuddesa antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:124.6: evañca so samaṇuddeso bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so samaṇuddeso bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo
pli-tv-bu-pm:124.7: “ajjatagge te, āvuso, samaṇuddesa na ceva so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo,
pli-tv-bu-pm:124.8: yampi caññe samaṇuddesā labhanti bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ, sāpi te natthi,
pli-tv-bu-pm:124.10: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpeyya vā, upaṭṭhāpeyya vā, sambhuñjeyya vā, saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:125.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno evaṃ vadeyya “na tāvāhaṃ, āvuso, etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi, yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:125.2: Sikkhamānena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ paripañhitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
pli-tv-bu-pm:126.1: Yo pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī”ti, sikkhāpadavivaṇṇake pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:127.1: Yo pana bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya
pli-tv-bu-pm:127.2: “idāneva kho ahaṃ jānāmi, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:127.3: Tañce bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ nisinnapubbaṃ iminā bhikkhunā dvattikkhattuṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne, ko pana vādo bhiyyo, na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpanno, tañca yathādhammo kāretabbo, uttari cassa moho āropetabbo
pli-tv-bu-pm:127.4: “tassa te, āvuso, alābhā, tassa te dulladdhaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamānena sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karosī”ti,
pli-tv-bu-pm:128.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṃ dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:129.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggireyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:130.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:131.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya “itissa muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:132.1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭheyya “yaṃ ime bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:133.1: Yo pana bhikkhu dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:134.1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:135.1: Yo pana bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya “yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:136.1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:137.1: Yo pana bhikkhu rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa anikkhantarājake aniggataratanake pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito indakhīlaṃ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:138.1: Yo pana bhikkhu ratanaṃ vā ratanasammataṃ vā aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:138.2: Ratanaṃ vā pana bhikkhunā ratanasammataṃ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṃ “yassa bhavissati, so harissatī”ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
pli-tv-bu-pm:139.1: Yo pana bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāvikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:140.1: Yo pana bhikkhu aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpeyya, bhedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:141.1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānena aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā. Taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:142.1: Yo pana bhikkhu mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpeyya, uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:143.1: Nisīdanaṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikaṃ kāretabbaṃ, tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso dve vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ diyaḍḍhaṃ, dasā vidatthi. Taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:144.1: Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo. Taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:145.1: Vassikasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso cha vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyā. Taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:146.1: Yo pana bhikkhu sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya, atirekaṃ vā, chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-pm:146.2: Tatridaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ, dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ cha vidatthiyo, idaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:147.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto dvenavuti pācittiyā dhammā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:148.1: Ime kho panāyasmanto cattāro pāṭidesanīyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:149.1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā
pli-tv-bu-pm:149.2: “gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:150.1: Bhikkhū paneva kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti, tatra ce sā bhikkhunī vosāsamānarūpā ṭhitā hoti “idha sūpaṃ detha, idha odanaṃ dethā”ti. Tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā “apasakka tāva bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti. Ekassapi ce bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādetuṃ “apasakka tāva bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti, paṭidesetabbaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi
pli-tv-bu-pm:150.2: “gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjimhā asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:151.1: Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā, bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā, bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā
pli-tv-bu-pm:151.2: “gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:152.1: Yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā, bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā agilāno khādeyya vā, bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā
pli-tv-bu-pm:152.2: “gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:153.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pāṭidesanīyā dhammā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:154.1: Ime kho panāyasmanto sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:160.1: Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:161.1: Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:162.1: Na ujjagghikāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:163.1: Na ujjagghikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:165.1: Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:166.1: Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:167.1: Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:168.1: Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:169.1: Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:170.1: Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:171.1: Na khambhakato antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:172.1: Na khambhakato antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:173.1: Na oguṇṭhito antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:174.1: Na oguṇṭhito antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:175.1: Na ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:176.1: Na pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:185.1: Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:186.1: Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāyāti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:187.1: Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:188.1: Na ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:189.1: Na anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:190.1: Na bhuñjamāno sabbahatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:191.1: Na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:194.1: Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:195.1: Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:196.1: Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:197.1: Na daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:198.1: Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:199.1: Na āvudhapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:200.1: Na pādukāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:201.1: Na upāhanāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:202.1: Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:203.1: Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:204.1: Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:205.1: Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:206.1: Na oguṇṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:207.1: Na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:208.1: Na nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:209.1: Na ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:210.1: Na pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:211.1: Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:212.1: Na ṭhito agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:213.1: Na harite agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:214.1: Na udake agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:216.1: Ime kho panāyasmanto satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-pm:218.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā.
pli-tv-bu-pm:219.10: Ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchati.
pli-tv-bu-pm:219.11: Tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbanti.
